pages.title: Vault Relics
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Vault Relics$() are a permanent buff to your $(#033dfc)Vaults$() that add $(#033dfc)+30s$() for each unique $(#033dfc)Relic Statue$()!$(br)There are in total $(#033dfc)9 different sets$() for a max of $(#033dfc)+4m30s$() permanently added to the $(#033dfc)Vault Timer$().

pages.title: Obtaining and Creating
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Vault Relics$() are created through $(#033dfc)5 matching Relic pieces$() combined inside a crafting grid, upon placing it for the first time, the buff will be $(#033dfc)applied$() to the $(#033dfc)Player$() who placed it.$(br2)Relic Pieces can be obtained through $(#033dfc)Unidentified Relics$() or $(#033dfc)Relic booster Packs$().
